question:
Nowadays, parents are allowing their children to use tablets and smartphones to enhance learning.
Do the advantages of this development outweigh the disadvantages?
text: With the advancement in technology, many parents these days permit their offsprings to use electronic gadgets like smartphones and laptops for learning purpose. This essay will firstly, explore some benefits of using these devices by students and secondly, we will discuss the drawbacks of switching to a digital world.

To begin with, the smart learning process has proven to be very efficient in terms of enhancing knowledge and acquiring skills by the younger generation. To elaborate, enormous online study materials are available at the ease and free of cost which can be utilized by students to gain the understanding of any topic and building expertise to compete in this highly developed world.
For example, it is only the smartphones and computers which made it possible for children to continue their study by attending the online classes during the Covid-19 pandemic.

On the other hand, misuse and overuse of these electronic devices can be hazardous for the physical and mental health of teenagers. To explain, if parents do not keep a check on the activities of their kids, it can affect their health and can destroy their career in some cases. For instance, if a child spends a lot of time on devices, it will have a devastating effect on his wellness such as eyesight problem, moreover, watching immoral and unethical data can destroy the mentality of youngsters. Instead, with proper mentorship and guidance, these problems can be mitigated by the guardians.

To conclude, despite allowing kids to use devices like laptops and mobile phone have some benefits in terms smart learning, it also has some negative aspects due to the misuse and lack of guidance by the parents. However, the benefits of using smart devices seem to outweigh the disadvantages.
